ADMIN.HELP: Do you need help? Check out our support page!

PROJECT_EXPORT.DESCRIPTION: Export your project to save a backup or to create a new one based on this.

MODULES.BACKLOG_DESCRIPTION: Manage your user stories to maintain an organized view of upcoming and prioritized work.
MODULES.KANBAN_DESCRIPTION: Organize your project in a lean way with this board.
MODULES.ISSUES_DESCRIPTION: Track the bugs, questions and enhancements related to your project. Don't miss anything!
MODULES.WIKI_DESCRIPTION: Add, modify, or delete content in collaboration with others. This is the right place for your project documentation.
MODULES.MEETUP_DESCRIPTION: Choose your videoconference system. Even developers need face to face contact.
MODULES.SALT_CHAT_ROOM: If you want you can append a salt code to the name of the chat room

REPORTS.TITLE: Reports
REPORTS.SUBTITLE: Export your project data in CSV format and make your own reports.
REPORTS.DESCRIPTION: Download a CSV file or copy the generated URL and open it in your favourite text editor or spreadsheet to make your own project data reports. You will be able to visualize and analize all your data easily.
REPORTS.HELP: How to use this on my own spreadsheet?

CUSTOM_FIELDS.SUBTITLE: Specify the custom fields for your user stories, tasks and issues
CUSTOM_FIELDS.US_ADD: Add a custom field in user stories
CUSTOM_FIELDS.TASK_ADD: Add a custom field in tasks
CUSTOM_FIELDS.ISSUE_ADD: Add a custom field in issues

PROJECT_VALUES_POINTS.TITLE: Us points
PROJECT_VALUES_POINTS.SUBTITLE: Specify the points your user stories could be estimated to

PROJECT_VALUES_PRIORITIES.TITLE: Issue priorities
PROJECT_VALUES_PRIORITIES.SUBTITLE: Specify the priorities your issues will have

PROJECT_VALUES_SEVERITIES.TITLE: Issue severities
PROJECT_VALUES_SEVERITIES.SUBTITLE: Specify the severities your issues will have

PROJECT_VALUES_STATUS.SUBTITLE: Specify the statuses your user stories, tasks and issues will go through

PROJECT_VALUES_TYPES.TITLE: Issues types
PROJECT_VALUES_TYPES.SUBTITLE: Specify the types your user stories could be estimated to

ROLES.WARNING_NO_ROLE: Be careful, no role in your project will be able to estimate the point value for user stories
ROLES.HELP_ROLE_ENABLED: When enabled, members assigned to this role will be able to estimate the point value for user stories

BITBUCKET.INFO_VERIFYING_IP: Bitbucket requests are not signed so the best way of verifying the origin is by IP. If the field is empty there will be no IP validation.

DELETE_PROJECT.TITLE: Delete project
DELETE_PROJECT.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
DELETE_PROJECT.SUBTITLE: All project data US/Tasks/Issues/Sprints/WikiPages will be lost! :-(
